page.title: 13My house
page.content: I live in{Oak Close}.It is near the{ {Ecclesbourne School}.You find it by going past the{Library}on your left, take the right turn and you are there. My house has four bedrooms,dining room,lounge,kitchen,utility room, shower room and bathroom. It has a medium sized back garden and quite a large front one. We have no greenhouse or shed in our garden, just a rabbit! As you walk in the house you see the {lounge}and{dining room.}Turn right and you have the{shower room}on your right and the{kitchen}and{utility room}on your left. Go up the{stairs}and on the right is the{bathroom}and a{bedroom}with another{bedroom}on the left. You find the other two{bedrooms}up the passage.
